titles.text: זבח פסח על הגדה של פסח

schema.title: Zevach Pesach on Pesach Haggadah
schema.heTitle: זבח פסח על הגדה של פסח

enDesc: A comprehensive commentary to the Haggadah written in typical Abarbanel style: He asks many insightful textual questions, reports possible answers from other commentators and finally relates his own original explanations.
enShortDesc: 16th-century commentary by Rabbi Don Yitzchak Abarbanel, structured as questions with detailed answers.
heTitle: זבח פסח על הגדה של פסח
